About Vision Learning Projects Chinese

I absolutely love Neill deGrasse Tyson’s explanation of how scary and impossible learning can feel at first, yet, as long as you desire so strongly to get where you are meant to go and put in the work, you can’t help but fall in love with learning and desire more. Watch his recounting of learning Calculus in high school.
